content: **drops pullover in snow and wristwarmers in drops ice** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the agatha wrist warmers pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **pullover** **sizes** s/m - l/xl - xxl no finished measurements shown in pattern due to the construction of the garment **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100% wool 50 g /50 m /54 yds 400-450-450 gr nr 25 green drops 9 mm / us 13 double-pointed needles drops 7 mm / us k crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge crochet gauge 18 chain = approx 14 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/83-10-b---agatha-wristwarmers
